title: The Merry-Go-Round
creator_credit: John Kemeny, ONF | NFB and Tanya Ballantyne
brief_description: A provocative opening to a discussion of youth and sexual ethics. What are adolescents saying and doing about sex now they have shaken the old taboos, but when their new morality is still far from certain?
creator_credit_for_label: John Kemeny, ONF | NFB and Tanya Ballantyne
